scripts.install-all: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f => fs.statSync(f).isDirectory() && fs.existsSync(path.join(f, 'package.json'))).forEach(dir => { console.log('Installing dependencies for ' + dir); spawnSync('npm', ['install'], { cwd: dir, stdio: 'inherit', shell: true }); });"
